arts.ttl: Chelsea v Benfica, Bodø/Glimt v Tottenham, and more: Champions League – live
arts.sum: ⚽ Updates from European and Football League games ⚽️ Live scores | Read today’s Football Daily | Email Yara Farther north, Thomas Frank will hope his side can find a creative spark, something they have lacked since the start of the season. While they lie fourth in the Premier League, they are ninth for chance creation. Last year, most of the games, it was [Dejan] Kulusevski, [James] Maddison, Sonny [Heung-min] and Dom[inic Solanke] who played. Now we have more or less a new front four and they are doing very well. Maybe we are creating more chances, dominating a bit more. All the right signs are there. Continue reading...
